page.title: 08WIGAN JUNIORS FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content:
I go to{Wigan Juniors.}I used to go on Saturday but the season has just finished now. We play at{Robin Park}on the astro-turf. Mr. Wiseman is the man who takes us. There are{21 teams}in three age groups :- under 12's, under 10's and under 8's. The age groups are all named after things eg, the U-12's are COLOURS, the U-10's BIG CATS and the U-8's CONQUERORS. I am in Cheetahs and we play in orange tops, light blue shorts and socks. The winners of the 84/85 season for my age group were the Leopards. Everyone got a game every Saturday they came. About three weeks ago we had a presentation and everyone got two things. If you only got one trophy you got a football as well.
{Adrian Mansfield}(aged 9) May 1985.
